heading: HB00551
0: AN ACT INCREASING THE SALARY GRADE OF PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS FROM SALARY GRADE 11 TO 20 AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREOF
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00551
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCREASING THE SALARY GRADE OF PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS FROM SALARY GRADE 11 TO 20 AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Gives meaning to the spirit and intent of the constitutional provision recognizing the role of teachers (Article XIV, Sections 4 and 5), by increasing their salaries.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DEL MAR, RAUL V.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
